main.title: # Bot Shop!
main.description: The bot shop offers various items for you (within the bot), just make a selection using the select menu below to select an item category!

select.roleplay_description: Here you can buy (with bot coins) items for the roleplay (or fictional life) category commands by clicking the select menu below!
select.not_found_hint: ### Hmmmm, still didn't find what you wanted?
select.not_found_hint2: If you didn't find what you wanted, try looking in another category, maybe you'll find it!

error.no_account_description: You don't have an account in the bot! Use %command% to create your account first.
error.item_not_found_description: This item is not currently available in the shop.
error.insufficient_funds_description:
You don't have enough Pollens to buy **%item_name%**!

ğŸ’° **Price:** %item_price% Pollens
ğŸ’³ **Your balance:** %current_balance% Pollens
